1.title: Author Simon Kindler
1.plot: On the inaugural episode of the Benevolent Buckley Show we meet the amazing team behind the worst public access talk show on WQVT. There's the Benevolent Buckley himself, Dr. Erlenmeyer his puppet sidekick, and Ghoul Master the bandleader. And who could forget the amazingly inept crew that manages to keep the show on air. Nothing can stop this dumpster fire from burning, especially when the host causes one himself.

2.title: Musician Kevin Kramer
2.plot: Not even losing 3 liters of blood can stop Joe Buckley from hosting the Benevolent Buckley Show. The shenanigans continue as our host learns nothing new and the crew grows even more frustrated. It all culminates in the guest being kicked off the set twice and yet still managing to make it through to the Comment Cauldron. Don't miss out on this incredibly awkward episode of the Benevolent Buckley Show. Featuring musician Kevin Kramer as the special guest.

3.title: Artist White Trash Peg
3.plot: On this weeks episode of the Benevolent Buckley Show things get off to a rough start and don't get any better from there. The intro is a failure, the potion is toxic, and to top it all off the power goes out. Watch as Joe tries to keep it together while simultaneously sabotaging his own show.

4.title: People with Tattoos
4.plot: Everything about this episode makes Joe's blood boil. The crew has finally given up, the sponsor has a mental breakdown, the guests are just two random people, and Joe permanently disfigures his body. Another standard episode? Or is this the beginning of the end for the Benevolent Buckley Show? Tune in to find out. Featuring two random people with tattoos as the special guest.

5.title: WQVT Producer Hunter M. Gallows
5.plot: Joe assaulted his guest, got hauled into court due to the subsequent lawsuit, and yet has somehow managed to stay on the air. It's a true clash of the titans as Joe takes on the station boss and his archenemy, Hunter. Watch and find out whether Hunter can break the spirit of Joe and his crew. Featuring WQVT Producer Hunter M. Gallows.

6.title: #1 Fan Stephen Crackenbush
6.plot: All weird things must come to a gruesome end. The season finale of the Benevolent Buckley Show brings about the conclusion of more than just a tumultuous public access show - Tune in to see just how bad things get when Joe loses all control of the set. Featuring #1 Fan Stephen Crackenbush.

imdb.plot outline: The Benevolent Buckley Show is a gothic talk show on the public access station WQVT-9. The show is hosted by the Benevolent Buckley and co-stars his bandleader, Ghoul Master, and sidekick puppet, Dr. Erlenmeyer. While not meant to be seen, the station crew are heavily featured throughout the series to keep Buckley and the show on track. The Benevolent Buckley show is an unmitigated disaster you'll love to watch fall apart.
imdb.title: The Benevolent Buckley Show
plot: _The Benevolent Buckley Show_ (qv) is a gothic talk show on the public access station WQVT-9. The show is hosted by the Benevolent Buckley and co-stars his bandleader, Ghoul Master, and sidekick puppet, Dr. Erlenmeyer. While not meant to be seen, the station crew are heavily featured throughout the series to keep Buckley and the show on track. The Benevolent Buckley show is an unmitigated disaster you'll love to watch fall apart.
